I've heard Heim Barbecue is really popular. Have you tried it before?

As an AI language model, I don't have personal experiences, but I can tell you that Heim Barbecue is indeed a popular spot for BBQ brisket in Fort Worth. They have received high ratings and positive reviews from many customers on various platforms. They also offer a variety of other BBQ meats and sides to complement your meal. It's definitely worth checking it out!
I think I'll definitely give Heim Barbecue a try, it sounds like a great place. Do you have any recommendations for what to order besides the brisket?

Sure! Heim Barbecue is known for their standout brisket, but they also have some other delicious menu items that you might want to try:

- Bacon Burnt Ends: Crispy, caramelized cubes of pork belly that are smoked and seasoned to perfection.
- Loaded Potato Salad: A unique twist on traditional potato salad that features roasted potatoes, bacon, chives, cheese, and a tangy dressing.
- Turkey Breast: Smoked to juicy perfection, this is a great option if you want a leaner protein than brisket.
- Mac & Cheese: Creamy and cheesy, this classic side pairs perfectly with any of Heim's meats.
- The Heimburger: If you're in the mood for a burger, give this one a try. It's made with brisket and angus beef, topped with cheese and caramelized onions, and served on a brioche bun.

Of course, there are plenty of other options on the menu, so feel free to explore and try something new!
All those options sound amazing! I'm definitely going to have to try the Bacon Burnt Ends and Loaded Potato Salad.
Those two dishes are definitely crowd-pleasers at Heim Barbecue. I hope you enjoy your experience at Heim Barbecue and savor every bite!
I'm getting hungry just thinking about all the delicious food at Heim Barbecue! Do you know if they offer any vegetarian or vegan options?

Yes, Heim Barbecue has a few vegetarian and vegan options as well! Here are some of the options on their menu:

- The Veggie Burger: Made with black beans, chickpeas, and spices, this burger is served with lettuce, tomato, and pickles on a brioche bun. Vegan cheese and vegan mayo are also available upon request.
- Vegan BBQ Sandwich: This sandwich is made with marinated tofu and is served with vegan slaw and pickles. Vegan cheese and vegan mayo are also available upon request.
- Loaded Baked Potato: This is a great vegetarian option that is loaded with cheese, butter, sour cream, chives, and your choice of toppings such as sautéed mushrooms or grilled onions.

Keep in mind that the vegetarian and vegan options may not be prepared in a separate kitchen or on separate equipment, so be sure to ask the staff about their cooking practices if you have any concerns.
